metatags.og:title: Nevada Legislature Passes Consumer Health Data Privacy Bill
metatags.og:description: If signed, Nevada's SB 370 bill may impose strict requirements on the collection, use and sale of consumer health data, including separate consents, prohibitions on selling without authorization and a narrower definition of health data.

metatags.author: Deborah Erlanger
metatags.og:title: Nevada Privacy Act - Centraleyes
metatags.og:description: What is the Nevada Privacy Act? The Nevada Privacy Act (NPA), also referred to as NRS 603A, is a state-specific data privacy framework aimed at enhancing the protection of personal data for Nevada residents. Enacted in 2019 and subsequently amended, this law imposes obligations on businesses operating in Nevada to ensure the privacy and security […]
